content: crochet a pair of these cute and classic baby booties to welcome a new little one into the world this free crochet pattern will teach you how to make soft and stretchy crochet booties that will be comfortable for baby to wear these easy crochet baby booties are so cute and make the perfect gift for a new baby girl or baby boy **crochet baby booties pattern** are you looking for a cute and classic crochet baby pattern then this free baby bootie crochet pattern is perfect for you these cute little booties are an adorable baby shower gift and a great addition to any newborn s wardrobe this professionally edited pattern will teach you everything you need to know to make classic baby booties it s an easy pattern made with basic crochet stitches so it s perfect for beginners and advanced crocheters alike it s a gender-neutral design that you can customize to suit the little girl or boy in your life and of course you can adapt the pattern to fit all different sizes of little feet **size** for newborns we recommend sole size of 3 5 inches for 0-3 months old 3 75 inches for 3-6 months 4 25 inches for 6-12 months old 4 75 inches **gauge** to check your gauge i recommend working up the entire sole section of the pattern and measuring its length we recommend hook size e 3 5 mm for newborns size g 4 mm for 0-3 months old size h 5 mm for 3-6 months old or size j 6 mm for 6-12 months
